DOC.brief_summary: The main goals of the study are: Assessment of Tygacil's cost-effectiveness; Process cost analysis from a hospital perspective (including length of stay, treatment costs, side effect management costs, costs of monitoring, costs of diagnostic procedures, cost of care (TISS 10 score etc.); Efficacy of Tygacil under usual care conditions (cure rate).
